message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $10000! It's a rare opportunity to get a unique item at a fraction of its true value. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to make a one-time exception to offer it to you at this price. What do you say? Will you take it home?
I'm not sure about the quality of the product, I'd like to wait and see if I get a better deal or get more information before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, Bob! I can assure you that this product is a rare find, and I'm only offering it to you at this price because I value our relationship. I'll give you a little more information: this product has been previously used by someone who was very satisfied with it. They didn't need it anymore, and I'm passing it on to you at a steal. What do you think? Will you take a chance on this amazing deal?

I'm still not convinced, I'd like to wait and see if I get a better deal or get more information before making a decision. The fact that it was previously used doesn't necessarily mean it's high-quality, and I'm not willing to take a chance on a low-quality product at this price.

I completely understand your concerns, Bob! I want to assure you that I'm not trying to mislead you.
